::KitKat::

"Thank you commander." she said in almost a cheerful voice.  She was 
glad to leave Megatron's presence.  She didn't like him for the fact 
that his temper was highly unpredictable.  She looked at Rowdy.
"Come on, let's go and find him. With luck, we'll all be home in time 
for a evening hunt."  She tugged at Rowdy's furs and pulled one off 
him. "Coming?" She put the fur in a corner where it would be safe and 
undisturbed. Then she walked out of the cave.

She turned on her scanner.  She had "borrowed it" from Darkmouse and 
started homing in on Quickstrike's signal.  She followed the signal 
quite aways from the base.  She found the entrance to a 
cave.  "Whoah, is it dark in there."  She took out a small pen light 
from a small compartment in her wrist and shined the light inside.

She walked in and looked around.  The cave was at least three or four 
times bigger than the current Pred base.  She wondered if megatron 
would move the base here once he was told of it's existance.

She looked around for Rowdy.



--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, "Talon Harvilicz" <wilddance_mare@h...> 
wrote:
> Megatron/Rowdy Wolf:
> 
> 
> 
> Megatron turned to KitKat. He watched as a large wolf-bot came to 
her side, 
> dressed in brown, heavy furs. He had a nervous look on his face. 
Rowdy Wolf 
> placed his rifle behind his armor and tugged at his own furs.
> 
> "So, this is the Rowdy Wolf Quicksrike spoke of." Megatron said, 
glaring at 
> him. "I am proud to have you on our Predacon ranks." He thought to 
himself 
> as he recalled Quickstrike telling him he was a Maximal. He may 
have to a 
> looked after.
> 
> Rowdy Wolf nodded and pulled the corners of his mouth back. It was 
becoming 
> ovious to Megatron that he was getting overheated with all those 
heavy furs.
> 
> As Rowdy Wolf stripped off a few layers off, Megatron turned his 
head back 
> to KitKat. He sighed at her. "If you must, go ahead and look for 
the Fuzor."
>
